questions.question_text: E brahma thaki Parabrahma je Purushottam Nārāyan te nokhā chhe ne e brahmanā paņ _____ chhe ne ādhār chhe ne prerak chhe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states that Parabrahma Purushottam Narayan is different from Brahma and is the cause, support, and motivator of Brahma.

questions.question_text: Deh indriya aru man ādika ke, sangamen _____ lapṭāve... Sant...
questions.explanation: The kirtan states 'Deh indriya aru man ādika ke, sangamen nahī lapṭāve... Sant...'

questions.question_text: Pruthvi jenī rākhī sthir rahī chhe ne dolāvī dole chhe tathā ā _____ jenu rākhyu adhar rahyu chhe tathā jenā varasāvyā megh varshe chhe...
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut describes the earth being stable and the constellations being suspended by Bhagwan.

questions.question_text: Jīv īshwar taṇo re, māyā kāḷ puruṣh pradhān; sahune vash karū̃ re, sahuno _____ hū̃ Bhagavān... 6
questions.explanation: The Oradānā Pad states that 'Jīv īshwar taṇo re, māyā kāḷ puruṣh pradhān; sahune vash karū̃ re, sahuno prerak hū̃ Bhagavān... 6'

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnī mūrtinu baļ atishay rākhavu je, 'Sarvoparī ne sadā divya sākārmūrti ane sarva avatārnu _____ evu je Bhagwānnu swarūp chhe te ja mane prāpt thayu chhe.'
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut emphasizes the importance of believing that the Swarup of Bhagwan is the cause of all avatars.

questions.question_text: Ane je em jāņato hoy ne tethī jo kadāchit satsangthī bāher nīsarī javāņu toy pan tene Bhagwānnī mūrtimāthī het țaļatu nathī ane te hamaņā to satsangthī bāher chhe pan deh mūkīne to ante Bhagwānnu je _____ tene vishe Bhagwānne samīpe jashe.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states that even if someone leaves the Satsang but maintains affection for Bhagwan, they will go to Akshardham after death.

questions.question_text: E je ekras tej chhe tene ātmā kahie tathā brahma kahīe ne _____ kahīe; ane e prakāshne vishe je Bhagwānnī mūrti chhe tene ātmānu tattva kahīe tathā Parabrahma kahīe tathā Purushottam kahīe...
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut identifies the one essence of light as Atma, Brahma, and Akshardham.

questions.question_text: Je tejne vișhe mūrti chhe te ja pratyaksh Mahārāj chhe,' em _____.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut emphasizes that the murti within the light is the प्रत्यक्ष (pratyaksh) Maharaj and instructs one to know this.

questions.question_text: Jevu paroksh Bhagwānnā Rām-Krushņādik avatārnu māhātmya jāņe chhe tathā Nārad, Sanakādik, Shukjī, Jad-Bharat, Hanuman, Uddhav ityādik je parokșh sādhu tenu jevu māhātmya jāņe chhe tevu ja pratyaksh evā je Bhagwān tathā te Bhagwānnā bhakta _____ tenu māhātmya samaje tene kalyānnā mārgmā kāīye samajavu bākī rahyu nahī.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut highlights that understanding the greatness of pratyaksh Bhagwan and the bhakta sadhu is essential for attaining kalyan.

questions.question_text: _____ vakhāniyā vānarne, vyāse vakhāniyā pashupal; Te pragat bhakti pratāpthi, vādhiyo jash vishal.
questions.explanation: The Bhaktinidhi states 'Vālmiki vakhāniyā vānarne, vyāse vakhāniyā pashupal; Te pragat bhakti pratāpthi, vādhiyo jash vishal.'
